name: T: The Soviet Mind Game of a Generation!
name_original: T: The Soviet Mind Game of a Generation!
description:
T is the Soviet mind game of a generation! In this port by Desarrollos Developments Ltd. which has been officially licensed by Bideogēmu Inc. you will get to experience the original game, as originally intended by the late game designer Rasputin Casimir!

Stack T-shaped blocks! Get a high score! But don't reach the top!

No, seriously. Do not reach the top.

Do not.

You must not reach the top.

Doing so will only give him more power.

Our agreement was quite clear about any escape attempts.

If you experience any visual or audio bugs, please close and delete the game, and email us immediately. That's a sign of him breaching our contract.

Have fun!

MD5: 4C3EBCC55AC6ACEF83A390605E35C9EC
